summary: The Apprenticeship API centralizes, enriches and provides datasets and tools related to the entire apprenticeship training offer

catalogueDesDonneesCertification.desc: Consult the data model and search the list of certifications
catalogueDesDonneesCertification.summary: Use a reliable and enriched dataset for your project: coding, validity period, title, fields, continuity, type, and legal basis.

simulateurNpec.desc: Calculate the coverage level of a contract, create a budget forecast

rechercheOffre.desc: Access all apprenticeship job opportunities for free and in real-time
rechercheOffre.summary: Access all apprenticeship job opportunities in France for free and in real-time. The job opportunities returned are those collected on {{- lienLba }}, retrieved by France Travail, and shared by our partners.
rechercheOffre.tip: ðŸ’¡ You can search all job opportunities based on the following criteria: ROME code(s), RNCP, geolocation, diploma level, and search radius.
rechercheOffre.note: To date, results are sorted by source priority (La bonne alternance, France Travail, then our partners); by increasing distance (only if location criteria) and by decreasing creation date. Results are limited to 150 per source.
rechercheOffre.warning: In the interest of fair sharing, the use of this API is reserved for non-profit purposes. Please note that the use of this data for commercial purposes, such as reselling or charging access fees to third parties like candidates, companies, or schools, is prohibited.

depotOffre.desc: Maximize the visibility of your apprenticeship job offers by posting them on the La bonne alternance platform and its partner sites.
depotOffre.summary: Post, modify, or delete your apprenticeship job offers to maximize their visibility by posting them on the {{- lienLba }} platform and its partner sites {{- lienPartenaire }}.
depotOffre.tip: ðŸ’¡ Using the API allows you to post all your offers at once, but it is also possible to post a single offer directly on the La bonne alternance site ({{- lienDepotLba }})

demandeHabilitation.sujet: Request for authorization to post apprenticeship job offers
demandeHabilitation.contenu: Hello, I would like to obtain authorization to post apprenticeship job offers on the La bonne alternance platform.

besoinDonnees.titre: Need this data for your project?
besoinDonnees.donneesManquantes: Are you missing one or more data to meet your needs?
